component.name: PhotoQuick
component.summary: A handy image viewer and editor with useful features and plugins support
component.description:
A handy image viewer and editor with useful features and plugins support.
This program is aimed at ease of use, quick opening, and doing most necessary features.
Features :
Export to PDF
Auto Resize to file size
Crop in particular ratio
Rotate, mirror, perspective transform
Add Border
Create photo grid for printing
Magic Eraser (inpainting)
Intelligent Scissor
Filters
Scan Page
Auto Contrast
White Balance
Reduce Noise
With Scissor tool you can erase background. You can create mask with scissor tool, thus you can blur or darken the background. Magick eraser (Inpaint) tool can be used to erase cracks or objects in scanned photos.
Get plugins from github page for more features.
